home.title: Select a Service
home.description: Choose which service you want to download from.

unified.pageDescription: Paste video links and automatically detect platform. Supports Bilibili audio and Douyin videos.

bilibili.pageDescription: Paste a Bilibili video link to extract and download the audio.

douyin.pageDescription: Paste a Douyin video link to download the video without watermark.

page.title: Bilibili & Douyin Downloader
page.description: Download history is saved locally in your browser, no server-side data retention.

errors.clipboardPermission: Please check if clipboard permission is granted.

metadata.title: Bilibili & Douyin Downloader - Easily Extract MP3 Audio from Bilibili and Videos from Douyin
metadata.description: Free online tool to download Bilibili audio and Douyin videos. Paste a link to extract high-quality MP3 audio or download watermark-free videos.
metadata.keywords: Bilibili audio download, Douyin video download, Bilibili to MP3, Douyin no-watermark
metadata.ogDescription: Free online tool for Bilibili audio and Douyin video downloads. One-click audio extraction from Bilibili and watermark-free video downloads from Douyin.
